content.rendered:
Directed by Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari.

Written by Bareilly Ki Barfi. Shreyas Jain. Nitesh Tiwari.

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana(Chirag Dubey). Kriti Sanon(Bitti Mishra). Rajkummar Rao(Pritam Vidrohi). Pankaj Tripathi(Narottam Mishra). Seema Pahwa(Sushila Mishra (as Seema Bhargava)). Rohit Choudhary(Munna (as Rohit Chaudhury)). Swati Semwal(Rama – Bitti’s Friend). Sapna Sand(Vidrohi’s Mother). Javed Akhtar(Narrator). Naila Grewal(Babli). Loveleen Mishra(Chirag’s Mother). Vishal Anand(Railway Policeman). Vivek Kumar Yadav(Rangbaaz Guy (as Vivek Yadav)). Satish Brahmbhatt(Satish). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)).Nadeem Sheikh

Language Hindi.

Producers Abhay Chopra. Juno Chopra. Kapil Chopra. Renu Chopra. Vineet Jain. Madhav Roy Kapur. Satish Mane. Priti Shahani.

Production B.R. Studios. Junglee Pictures. NH Studios.
